Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for test_result_other

  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#undetectable ("undetectable")

Answer options for hbsag_result

  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#negative ("Negative")
  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#positive ("Positive")

Answer options for diagnosis_result

  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#negative ("Negative")
  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#positive ("Positive")

Answer options for anti_hcv_result

  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#negative ("Negative")
  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#positive ("Positive")

Answer options for diagnosis_result

  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#negative ("Negative")
  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#positive ("Positive")

Answer options for child_prophylasis

  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#yes ("Yes")
  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#no ("No")
  • http://example.org/CodeSystem/casereporting-hiv-vn-casereport-answeroptions#unknown ("Unknown")
